subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Thomas Bjorn won the European Masters for his second victory in two weeks, closing with a nine-under 62 for a four-stroke victory in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland.
snippet: Thomas Bjorn won the European Masters for his second victory in two weeks, closing with a nine-under 62 for a four-stroke victory in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland.
